name: Through The Warp
description:
-------------------------------Controls-----------------------------------------
Arrow Keys / WASD to Move
Space to Jump
Enter to bring up menu
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This is my first game that originally released a year ago. The old version was horrible. It was slow, clunky and ran at an awful resolution. So a year later I remade it in 1 month and fixed everything that was bad about the old version. I hope you enjoy my first game of many more to come. Have a great day.

You can Find me on :
Newgrounds - http://assrgbgnome.newgrounds.com/
